text: Mikhail Prusak (left) with Vladimir Putin. Mikhail Mikhaylovich Prusak () (born February 3, 1960 in Dzhurkiv, Kolomyiskyi Raion, Stanislav Oblast, Ukrainian SSR) was the governor of Novgorod Oblast, Russia from 1991 to 2007. On August 7, 2007 he resigned, and Sergey Mitin was appointed the governor. Prusak was also a member of the Supreme Soviet of the USSR from 1989 to 1991. ==References== Category:Soviet politicians Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Novgorod Oblast
title: Mikhail Prusak
